header.p1: When renovating an apartment, house, or commercial space, it is often necessary to intervene in the building's systems. Whether it's plumbing, electrical, or air conditioning systems, proper design is essential to ensure the safety and functionality of the home or business premises.
header.p2: Evo Home, with over 17 years of experience in this field, is committed to creating the most modern systems that always comply with current regulations and provide all legally required certifications. We specialize in the installation, maintenance, and modernization of complex systems that improve quality of life and increase property value.

1.p: Residential electrical systems are subject to strict standards regulating their design, installation, and testing to ensure high performance and safety. Evo Home designs and installs electrical systems in accordance with CEI 64-8 regulations, issuing a declaration of conformity.

2.p: Installing gas systems requires advanced technical skills and strict safety compliance. Our team guarantees professional installation, paying maximum attention to joint sealing and pipe integrity to ensure perfect system tightness.

3.p: Underfloor heating is one of the most popular solutions for new builds and renovations. This system not only ensures exceptional comfort through even heat distribution but also allows significant energy savings, especially when combined with renewable energy sources.

4.p: Drainage and sewage systems are crucial components for proper wastewater management. Our company designs and installs drainage systems connected to the main sewer system, ensuring optimal efficiency and maximum safety.

5.p: Thermo-hydraulic systems are designed for climate control in both summer and winter. They use hot water as a heat carrier, providing efficient heating. Evo Home designs and installs thermo-hydraulic systems that ensure not only residential comfort but also significant energy savings.

6.p: Climate control is essential for ensuring comfort in both residential and commercial premises. The need for modern air quality management systems depends on the characteristics of the space and the local climate.

7.p: Communication networks, essential for commercial operations, are installed after laying the main plant infrastructures. Laying low-voltage lines includes running cables connecting individual meters with the necessary equipment.
